full_threads.body: (Time: 15mins)

Hi Keenan,

We have updated the header. We have adjusted the script for the menu as well.
https://acoufelt.com.au/

Thanks Joel.

Just noticed the nav is transparent when you land on the site, can you ensure this is 100% visible rather than transparent. Also the nav/menu isn't appearing when you search on your phone/mobile.

Everything else is working really well!

Warm regards,

Keenan Druce
Creative Lead



T: +61 1800 626 462
Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney, NSW, 2000
acoufelt.com

Hi Keenan,

Confirming the footer and header has been updated.
https://acoufelt.com.au/

Thanks so much Joel.

When you get a chance can you remove 'brands' and the 'modern slavery statement' from the footer and can you move 'industries' and 'sound advice' from the header to the footer.

Warm regards,

Keenan Druce
Creative Lead

Thanks

Hi Keenan,

Sure, we updated the styling, it will show 2 lines of the description.

Regarding the divider, we have added the items for you.
https://acoufelt.com.au/home-v2/

Thanks for this Joel.

I have gone ahead and updated as much as I can.

Is there a way I can add text onto the hero image and just on the solution and project carousels, can I limit the amount of text to say the first paragraph of the copy on that page, for the solutions, the amount is perfect but for the projects its one paragraph too long. Does that make sense?

Also, is it possible to add a divider between the sections?

Warm regards,

Keenan Druce
Creative Lead

Also you can set the featured Projects and Solutions

https://acoufelt.com.au/wp-admin/edit.php?post_type=projects

Just checking in with you to see how the home page is going, if its all good to go, please let me know and I can start the build the page accordingly unless that's something you and your team have already done
